info.description: Actions for sending messages to Slack via incoming webhook
info.title: Slack Notification API

post.description: Sends a formatted message to a Slack channel via an incoming webhook. The message should use Slack mrkdwn syntax: *bold* for headers, bullet points with •, and newlines for structure.

parameters.description: The message text to send to Slack, formatted using Slack mrkdwn syntax
parameters.name: message

ok.description: Whether the message was sent successfully
